trans-unit.source: A helper class that creates <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Classe di supporto che crea istanze <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: Once created, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator> creates new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instances, sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> and increments the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> for each successive <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instance created.
trans-unit.target: Una volta creato, l'oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator> crea nuove istanze <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>, imposta gli oggetti <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> e incrementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> per ogni istanza <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> successiva creata.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> class with the specified instance ID and sequence ID.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> con l'ID dell'istanza e l'ID della sequenza specificati.
